title: Foco Italics released
content:
Hi all!

I'm happy to announce that we've done Italics for our Foco fonts.  
Gentle angle, slightly narrower, cursive features; great for subtle emphasis on body copy and beautiful at display.

The italics are long waited and requested a number of times, including here at Typophile.

Hope you like it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823092419im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Foco_ToTypophile_4667.gif)

[www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/foco](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823092419/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/foco "www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/foco")

(A few samples and details can be seen on my flickr: [http://flickr.com/photos/fabiohaag/3214681859/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130823092419/http:/flickr.com/photos/fabiohaag/3214681859/ "http://flickr.com/photos/fabiohaag/3214681859/") )

Cheers
